questions.questionTitle: What protocol is used for transmitting email over the Internet?
What does DNS stand for in networking?
Which device is used to connect multiple computers in a local area network?
What is the purpose of the TCP protocol?
questions.option1: Ensuring reliable communication by providing error checking and flow control
questions.option2: Resolving domain names to IP addresses
questions.option4: Broadcasting messages to all devices on a network

questions.questionTitle: Which of the following is NOT a valid IP address class?
What is the default port number for HTTP?
Which network topology connects each device to a central hub?
What is the purpose of a subnet mask?
questions.option1: To determine the network portion of an IP address
